tool_description: Ryanair is known for offering the lowest fares in Europe.
name: Ryanair
title: Ryanair

api_list.name: Get Bag Information

required_parameters.name: session
required_parameters.description: `session` can be retrieved from `api/v1/getFlightDetails`(Get Flight Details) endpoint.

api_list.name: Get Extras

required_parameters.name: session
required_parameters.description: `session` can be retrieved from `api/v1/getFlightDetails`(Get Flight Details) endpoint.

api_list.name: Get Seats

required_parameters.name: session
required_parameters.description: `session` can be retrieved from `api/v1/getFlightDetails`(Get Flight Details) endpoint.

api_list.name: Get Price

required_parameters.name: flights

optional_parameters.name: infants
optional_parameters.description:
The number of infants.
***Note: The age must be below 2 years.***

optional_parameters.name: children
optional_parameters.description:
The number of children.
***Note: The age range should be between 2 and 11 years old.***

optional_parameters.name: teens
optional_parameters.description:
The number of teens.
***Note: The age range should be between 12 and 15 years old.***

optional_parameters.name: adults
optional_parameters.description:
The number of adults.
***Note: The age limit is 16+ years***

api_list.name: Get Fare Options

required_parameters.name: outboundFlightKey
required_parameters.description: From/Departure flight key. `outboundFlightKey` can be retrieved from `api/v1/searchFlights`(Search Flights) endpoint as `flightKey`.

required_parameters.name: outboundFareKey
required_parameters.description: From/Departure fare key. `outboundFareKey` can be retrieved from `api/v1/searchFlights`(Search Flights) endpoint as `fareKey `.

optional_parameters.name: children
optional_parameters.description:
The number of children.
***Note: The age range should be between 2 and 11 years old.***

optional_parameters.name: teens
optional_parameters.description:
The number of teens.
***Note: The age range should be between 12 and 15 years old.***

optional_parameters.name: infants
optional_parameters.description:
The number of infants.
***Note: The age must be below 2 years.***

optional_parameters.name: adults
optional_parameters.description:
The number of adults.
***Note: The age limit is 16+ years***

optional_parameters.name: inboundFlightKey
optional_parameters.description: To/Arrival flight key. `outboundFlightKey` can be retrieved from `api/v1/searchFlights`(Search Flights) endpoint as `flightKey`.

optional_parameters.name: inboundFareKey
optional_parameters.description: To/Arrival fare key. `outboundFareKey` can be retrieved from `api/v1/searchFlights`(Search Flights) endpoint as `fareKey `.

api_list.name: Search Flights

required_parameters.name: destination
required_parameters.description: To/Arrival airport code(IATA). `origin` can be retrieved from `api/v1/getActiveAirports`(Get Active Airports) endpoint.

required_parameters.name: outboundDate
required_parameters.description: The date of travel or journey.

required_parameters.name: origin
required_parameters.description: From/Departure airport code(IATA). `origin` can be retrieved from `api/v1/getActiveAirports`(Get Active Airports) endpoint.

optional_parameters.name: infants
optional_parameters.description:
The number of infants.
***Note: The age must be below 2 years.***

optional_parameters.name: teens
optional_parameters.description:
The number of teens.
***Note: The age range should be between 12 and 15 years old.***

optional_parameters.name: adults
optional_parameters.description:
The number of adults.
***Note: The age limit is 16+ years***

optional_parameters.name: children
optional_parameters.description:
The number of children.
***Note: The age range should be between 2 and 11 years old.***

optional_parameters.name: inboundDate
optional_parameters.description: The date for returning.

api_list.name: Availability Calendar

required_parameters.name: date
required_parameters.description: The date of travel or journey.

required_parameters.name: origin
required_parameters.description: From/Departure airport code(IATA). `origin` can be retrieved from `api/v1/getActiveAirports`(Get Active Airports) endpoint.

required_parameters.name: destination
required_parameters.description: To/Arrival airport code(IATA). `origin` can be retrieved from `api/v1/getActiveAirports`(Get Active Airports) endpoint.

api_list.name: Server Status
api_list.description: Check if server is up and running.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ryanair2.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/test"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ryanair2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://ryanair2.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/test"

headers = {

            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ryanair2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
